title: Mistery Gift missing?
body:
First of all, sry for my bad English...

So, I got Riot Kayle during the Draven event, after I unlocked Legendary skin from Hextech Crafting. In the article about Riot Kayle gifts, it says the deadline is on 9/23, after that day you should contact Support, so here i am asking if I should get mistery gift or is the way i got this skin making me unable to reiceve it?

I mean, I got it for free couple months ago, but it still feels little bit unfair for me since I didn't get enything for Riot's Birthday.

replies.body: The gifts are still being distributed, and the deadline has been moved back to Sept. 30. Just hang tight and you will get it soon!

We're not done sending gifts out yet per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  I see you got the icon already, but the gifts are being sent out separately.  Hang tight until we're done distributing the gits, and you'll get the goods!
thanks for responding, didn't see any information about the deadline being moved, thank you :)
